Fleet Management

    Home / Equipment Hire

Fleet Management

Managing your fleet is an important part of every operation, hence we provide fleet management systems designed to make your life easier.

Carrylift in association with FTC Systems can offer the following:

Optafleet – Advanced fleet management systems Fleet Aware – Pedestrian safety systems tag types and in cab display Speed Zoning – automatic zoned speed reduction system. Camera Systems – continual recording camera and vision aid camera’s Reversing Systems– advanced reversing aids Pedestrian Safety Lights – danger zone/blue spot/Arrow Mast & Fork Solutions – Laser indicator & Accu Tilt

With options available to meet the demands of any application, the systems help you ensure even the highest safety standards are met, and deliver effective report data.

Fleet managers can view real-time information such as vehicle location; utilisation of the vehicles and operations, damage, and critical event information – all in a clear and simple format.

The secure web tool provides 24-hour access to collected data, which can be shared with any designated member of your team.

The data provides a unique insight into your operation and helps reduce the total lifetime cost of your vehicle fleet.

Dedicated reporting and analytics tools enable your team to make informed decisions, improving overall utilisation of your fleet, the performance of your drivers and ensuring maximum efficiency.

There is a range of other features and optional upgrade for our fleet management systems:

  • Driver recognition and restricted usage of unauthorised vehicles.
  • Triple-axis impact damage detection.
  • Vehicle location.
  • Pre-shift vehicle checks.
  • Operators’ license details held on the key fob with refresher reminder.
  • Detailed operator and vehicle usage statistics.

Account Management

We achieve the very highest levels of account management by owning your problems, continuously measuring performance and clearly communicating results.

Your account will be managed by the corporate accounts or business managers’ team.

We find that consistently maintaining one principal point of contact results in a rapid response and consistently high standards as well as customer satisfaction.

Our specialist understanding of your requirements allows us to develop a true partnership and a rapid and consistent response to your needs.

Our regular review meetings focus on:

Review of performance and processes Agreement on future actions Reduction of non-contract costs New products, ideas and control systems to improve performance

Whether it is a new site, a new application, a new operation or a brand new contract, the Carrylift team has the experience to deliver; from initial site survey right through to the successful delivery and implementation of contracts and equipment.
